about_the_game:
Once a powerful sorcerer, Adrian now finds himself trapped in the world of Shadowvillie - betrayed by his student. Now, you must guide Adrian to rediscover his powers as you vanquish hordes of unrelenting enemies, uncovering secrets and mastering elements in an effort to return home.




Gameplay is based on 20-40 minutes runs with the ability to loop endlessly. Each run brings new spells, abilities and modifiers, making each playthrough a brand new experience. Choose unique combinations and upgrades for your mage and perfect your build in order to reach new heights.

As your adventure continues, you’ll uncover challenging boss fights, each with their own unique abilities and loot to unlock. Meet mysterious creatures throughout the world of ShadowVille and explore its secrets, all the while regaining your power.




Team up with your friends in this challenging adventure. Each of you will be able to choose your own path in magic. Become a powerful fire mage or combine elements to get unexpected reactions - it's up to you. Combine spells to maximize your power and try to escape from this time trap. But remember the bigger your team, the more difficult challenges await you.




The source of the cat mage’s magic lies in seven core elements: air, dark, fire, frost, lightning, nature, and water. With your knowledge and abilities, you can unlock powers beyond these primary elements, creating unique combinations to unleash new attacks.

Shoot catastrophic fireballs, whisk monsters away in a whirlwind, or summon all-consuming spheres of water. Tailor your attacks as you learn your enemies’ weaknesses as you prepare to take on the final boss.




In addition to elements, you can use spells like any other mage. As you progress, you will get more and more unique spells with different power and effect. Summon a black hole that attracts all enemies, cast a meteor shower that burns everything in its path, or turn a huge enemy into a small, harmless sheep. Spells also possess one of the seven elements that will allow you to combine more elements and get more unexpected effects.




Felix Lunnoson, Adrian's oldest student, finds a lost magical artifact, the Sphere of Outcasts, and uses it to imprison his teacher in a time dungeon. Adrian, who finds himself in the ShadowVillie world, recreates his castle with his last strength, but is deprived of his magic. The player as Adrian explores the roguelike world of ShadowVillie, destroys bosses to unlock magiс powers, meets creatures with unique set of abilities, and strives to return to the real world by unlocking ShadowVillie's secrets and mastering elements to restore his former power.

short_description: Arcane Blast is a fast-paced, action-packed roguelike brimming with sorcery. Master the seven elements, combine them to achieve powerful reactions and face swarms of enemies to help feline Mage Adrian find his way home from a time dungeon.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian
